text:
Went there for a flower workshop and the place was just so pretty and nice smelling!
The instructor was really kind and generous and gave a lot of pretty flowers for us to choose from! She was also very knowledgeable on her craft.
10/10 would go again ðŸ˜„

fyi, she uses premium quality essential oils! (thank you for being so generous, Julia)

the acrylic art pouring activity was also really therapeutic. we didnâ€™t just paint, Julia asked us meaningful questions to help us connect with our emotions during the process. was an interesting experience :D

Had a blast at Pink Olive Co's past workshops and decided to bring them into organise floral jamming and terrarium workshops for my staff. The team was extremely professional, well prepared and engaging. Highly recommend them for others looking for fun activities for all ages and group sizes.
Lovely experience with floral jamming class today, with Julia being a great teacher & host!

I have ordered bouquets from Pink Olive. She takes down every detail of my order. During situations where I may not be sure of the colour or theme, Pink Olive gives me suggestions from which I can choose.
The flowers chosen are beautiful and of good quality. Pink Olive is also punctual on Delivery. I always turn to Pink Olive when I need to order a bouquet for any occasion.
